documentation.text: @dev tells if the given factory is authorized to register apps

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "SFGov: factory must be a contract"

arguments.value: SFGov: factory must be a contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "SFGov: factory must be a contract"

documentation.text:
@dev allows the given factory to register new apps without requiring onetime keys
 @param factory must be an initialized contract

@dev withdraws authorization from a factory to register new apps.
 Doesn't affect apps previously registered by the factory.

attributes.text: @dev tells if the given factory is authorized to register apps

@dev allows the given factory to register new apps without requiring onetime keys
 @param factory must be an initialized contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "SFGov: factory must be a contract"

attributes.type: literal_string "SFGov: factory must be a contract"
attributes.value: SFGov: factory must be a contract

attributes.text:
@dev withdraws authorization from a factory to register new apps.
 Doesn't affect apps previously registered by the factory.

authorizeAppFactory(address,address).details: allows the given factory to register new apps without requiring onetime keys

isAuthorizedAppFactory(address,address).details: tells if the given factory is authorized to register apps

replaceGovernance(address,address).details: Replace the current governance with a new governance

unauthorizeAppFactory(address,address).details: withdraws authorization from a factory to register new apps. Doesn't affect apps previously registered by the factory.

updateContracts(address,address,address[.details: Update logics of the contracts NOTE: - Because they might have inter-dependencies, it is good to have one single function to update them all

updateSuperTokenLogic(address,address).details: Update supertoken logic contract to the latest that is managed by the super token factory

whiteListNewApp(address,bytes32).details: Whitelist a new app using a onetime key

params.key: is a deployer specific hash key which can be used once to register an app NOTE: To generate the key, use the SuperfluidGovernanceConfigs.getAppRegistrationConfigKey offchain.
